Title: A Little Murder
Plot: Grissom suspects murder when the body of a dwarf is found hanging from a rope high above a stage in a casino hotel where a convention of little people is being held. Catherine is attacked at a crime scene where a man was murdered during what appears to have been a home invasion.
GuestStars: Arlene Malinowski, Andy Mackenzie, Matthew Lang, Jack Galle, Greg Dohanic, Michael Gilden, Kaarina Aufranc, Linden Ashby, Danny Woodburn, Meredith Eaton, Phil Fondacaro
